old.balance_transfer_eligibility: Yes, 0% Easy Payment Plans available at participating merchants (3, 6, 12, or 24 months). Balance Transfer facility is also mentioned.
old.points_earning_rates: Plus Points earning rates: 5% on Duty Free, 2.5% on dining, 0.5% on all other spends.
old.airport_lounge_access: Unlimited complimentary access to over 1,500 lounges worldwide for the primary cardholder and supplementary cardholders.
old.dining_discounts: Up to 30% discount at over 2,000 restaurants across the UAE.
old.other_key_benefits: Free 24/7 roadside assistance, Credit Shield Pro (optional credit insurance), Utility bill payments facility, Auto salik top-up, DoubleSecure protection.

new.Balance Transfer: Option exists, but specific terms/rates (e.g., 0% BT rate) are Not Mentioned. 0% Easy Payment Plans (EPP) available for 3, 6, 12, or 24 months at select merchants.
new.Cashback_Summary: 5% Plus Points on Duty Free; 2.5% Plus Points on Dining; 0.5% Plus Points on General Retail Spends. Earning cap per statement is applicable.
new.Special_Discount_Summary: Up to 30% discount at over 2,000 restaurants across the UAE.
new.Lounge Access: Unlimited complimentary lounge access worldwide (over 1,500 comfortable premium lounges in more than 700 cities). Unlimited visits for cardholder. Supplementary cardholders can avail too.
new.Hotel & Dining Offers: Up to 30% discount at over 2,000 restaurants across the UAE via GoodTimes deals. Examples include 20% at Zanzi Bar, 15% at Patiala, 20% at The Royal Budha, and 20% at Perola Multicuisine Restaurant.
new.Other Key Benefits: Emergency & security services; Free 24/7 roadside assistance; Instant Plus points redemptions at key merchant outlets; Utility bill payments facility; Auto Salik top-up; DoubleSecure protection; Credit Shield Pro (0.99% monthly fee of outstanding balance, up to AED 300,000 decease cover, AED 100 pay out per day in case of hospitalization, up to AED 60,000 job loss cover for up to 12 months or until re-employment).
